cast.name: 米兰·什特尔利奇 Milan Strljic

writer.name: Slobodan Z. Jovanovic Slobodan Z. Jovanovic

introduction: Plot / SynopsisHenry Charles Bukowski is one of the greatest writers of the 20th century, often referred to as "lascivious Dostoevsky modern times". His way of life and his work - poetry, short stories, novels, has grown into one of the prophets and critics grim new order and became more of a direct witness the end of the century. Selected parts of its overall work this movie is his personal story at a time when his artistic work and life attitudes, but crucially influenced generations around.
